attributes.action: Prayer: The High Court's decision must stand.
attributes.additional_details:
Use of the Localism Act to reverse the High Court's ruling on prayers at council meetings must be prevented.

A decision to overrule the highest court in the land must never be based on the personal beliefs of the individual.

Communities Secretary Eric Pickles has undermined the rule of law in order to impose religious practice on a secular function.

Government must prevent this abuse of power from going ahead as it is damaging to both British law and democracy.
